pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rapidly Import Classifier Results into 'phyloseq' // Import classification results from the 'RDP Classifier' (Ribosomal Database Project),' 'USEARCH sintax,' 'vsearch sintax' and the 'QIIME2' (Quantitative Insights into Microbial Ecology) classifiers into 'phyloseq' tax_table objects.
